import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' const Profile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ adopting:'', petOwner:'', selling:'', company:'', location:'', favePet:'', images:'', youtube:'', facbook:'', instagram:'' }) const { adopting, petOwner, selling, company, location, favePet, images, youtube, facbook, instagram } = formData return (

)} Profile.propTypes = { } export default Profile
